name: efcore-migration-script-generator-task
description: Tool for projects that is using Code-First with EF Core. Generate migrations scripts that could be used to update an database (for instance with the task 'Azure SQL Database Deployment').
author: PEK's Productions

inputs.name: projectpath
inputs.label: Project Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to project (for instance a csproj-file) containing databases contexts. This must be an executable project. If the database context is defined in a library, select a project that is using this library.

inputs.name: targetfolder
inputs.label: Target Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Where migration scripts should be saved.
